title: A statement from Christian Sewing on Hudson Executive Capital's investment in Deutsche Bank
body:
Hudson Executive Capital, a New York-based investment firm, today disclosed a 3.1 percent stake in Deutsche Bank.
Christian Sewing, Deutsche Bank’s Chief Executive Officer, said:
“We welcome Hudson Executive’s investment in Deutsche Bank. Doug Braunstein and Hudson Executive come with deep backgrounds investing in financial services companies. We appreciate Hudson Executive’s confidence in our ability to execute on our strategic objectives.”
